kafka-topic.title: Kafka Topic
kafka-topic.description: Enter Kafka topic name. Only alphanumeric characters, dots, dashes, and underscores are allowed.

kafka-auto-offset-reset.title: Kafka Auto Offset Reset
kafka-auto-offset-reset.description: Select the suitable offset reset strategy.

fieldDescription.description:
The auto.offset.reset setting in Kafka determines what happens when there is no initial offset or if the current offset does not exist any longer on the server.
 EARLIEST: Start consumption from the earliest available message in the topic.
 LATEST: Start consumption from the latest message available in the topic.
 NONE: Throw an error if no offset is found for the consumer group, requiring explicit offset assignment.
